import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import styledet from "./detail.module.css"; import { Card, Row, Col, Table, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import logodewe from "../../assets/icons/Icon2.png"; import bcaa from "../../assets/icons/bca.jpg"; import { API } from "../../config/api"; function Detailorder(props) { const item = props.detail; const handleClose = () => props.setshowDetail(false); const handleClick = async () => { try { const response = await API.put("/transactionns/" + props?.data?.id); console.log(response); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } }; return ( <> {props.showDetail && (

No Fullname Gender No Phone
1 {props.data?.User?.fullname} {props.data?.User?.gender} {props.data?.User?.gender} Qty

Total 		{props.data?.qty}

{props.data?.subtotal}
)} ); } export default Detailorder;
